SELECT BOARD_SEQ as "seq", BOARD_SORT as "sort", BOARD_TYPE as "type", BOARD_SECT as "sect", BOARD_TITLE as "title", BOARD_CONTENTS as "contents", BOARD_DATE as "date", BOARD_HITS as "hits" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_BOARDS B WHERE BOARD_SEQ < #{seq} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{type} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT BOARD_SEQ as "seq", BOARD_SORT as "sort", BOARD_TYPE as "type", BOARD_SECT as "sect", BOARD_TITLE as "title", BOARD_CONTENTS as "contents", BOARD_DATE as "date", BOARD_HITS as "hits" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_BOARDS WHERE BOARD_SEQ > #{seq} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{type} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_PTFOLIO_BOARDS (BOARD_SORT, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SECT, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS) VALUES (#{sort}, #{type}, #{sect}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{date}, #{hits})
